description: Excello One Coat is an interiorarchitectural coating manufactured by The Sherwin-Williams Company, headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, or its authorized licensee Sherwin-Williams de Centro America (“SWCA”).  Excello One Coat is manufactured in a number of Sherwin-Williams facilities and the data used by the LCA were representative of all facilities in which Excello One Coat was produced.  This coating is designed to cover and protect architectural surfaces such as walls and ceilings.  For information about specific products,please visitwww.sherwin.com. In the Central America region please visit the SWCA website at www.sherwinca.com.
name: Excello One Coat - A28W57

description: Elastocolor Pittura and Elastocolor Pittura Plus are elastomeric protective paints, with permanent flexibility and high resistance to chemicals for internal and external surfaces. Elastocolor Waterproof is a waterproof, easy-to-clean acrylic paint for internal and external surfaces in permanent contact with water. Elastocolor Tonachino Plus is an elastic, water-repellent, algae and mould resistant, hygienising, elastomeric coating for internal and external surfaces. Elastocolor Rasante and Elastocolor Rasante SF are fibre-reinforced, elastomeric, high flexibility finishing products for internal and external applications.
name: Elastocolor Rasante  SF
